Mod3_Description: {c_important}Poison Trap{/c} Knocks Down enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:KNOCKDOWN}{/c} seconds when it activates.
Mod2_Description: {c_important}Poison Trap{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_17}*100|%|]{/c} chance to reset your {c_important}Imbuement{/c} Skill Cooldowns when activated.
Mod1_Description: You deal {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Poison damage to enemies standing inside your {c_important}Poison Trap{/c}.
desc:
{c_label}Cooldown:{/c} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c} seconds
{if:ADVANCED_TOOLTIP}{c_label}Lucky Hit Chance: {/c}{c_resource}[{Combat_Effect_Chance_Script_Formula_Override:1}|%|]{/c}
{/if}Place a trap that arms after {c_number}{buffduration:ARMING}{/c} seconds. It activates when an enemy moves within range, applying {c_number}{payload:TOOLTIP_DAMAGE}{/c} Poisoning damage over {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds to enemies in the area.

You can have {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} armed traps out at once.
name: Poison Trap
